items.name: Adaptive Fighting
items.shortDescription: Once per day as a move action, gain the benefit of a combat feat you don't have.
items.description: Select three combat feats that you do not have but whose prerequisites you meet. Once per day as a move action, you can gain the benefit of one of these feats for 1 minute. Each time you gain a level, you can replace one of these three selected feats with a different feat that you don’t have but meet the prerequisites for.

items.name: Advanced Melee Weapon Proficiency
items.shortDescription: No penalty to attacks with advanced melee weapons
items.description: You gain proficiency in advanced melee weapons.

items.name: Agile Casting

prerequisites.description: Key ability score 15, Dex 15, Mobility, caster level 4th

items.shortDescription: Cast a spell at any point during movement
items.description: As a full action, you can move up to your speed and cast a single spell with a casting time of one standard action or less at any point during your movement. If you have a supernatural ability that can be activated as a standard action or less, you can instead use that ability at any point during your movement.

items.name: Amplified Glitch
items.shortDescription: Disrupt devices, causing targets to become shaken for 1 round or more
items.description: As a standard action, you can wirelessly introduce a fast-acting virus into nearby technological devices to briefly cause them to malfunction in loud, surprising ways. You can use this ability on one target creature per character level, no two of which can be more than 30 feet apart. Each target must either be carrying technological devices or be within sight and hearing of such devices. While the locations of such devices are up to the GM, most public spaces (aside from technologically underdeveloped areas) contain enough technology for this feat to function. Your glitch causes alarms to go off, automated devices to spin and flail, readouts to flash brightly, and so on. With a successful Computers check (DC = 15 + 1 per target + 1-1/2 × the CR of the highest-CR target), all targets are shaken for 1 round, plus 1 additional round for every 5 by which your result exceeds the DC. Once you have targeted a creature with this feat, that foe is immune to this ability for 24 hours.

items.name: Antagonize
items.shortDescription: Anger a foe, causing it to become off-target and take a -2 penalty to skill checks for 1 round or more
items.description: You know how to make foes extremely angry with you. As a standard action, you can antagonize a foe that can see and hear you by attempting a Diplomacy or Intimidate check (DC = 10 + your opponent’s total Sense Motive skill bonus, or 15 + 1-1/2 × the opponent’s CR, whichever is higher). If you succeed, the foe is off-target and takes a –2 penalty to all skill checks for 1 round plus 1 additional round for every 5 by which your result exceeds the DC, or until it makes an attack against you, forces you to attempt a saving throw, or damages you (whichever comes first). Once you have attempted to antagonize a foe, that foe is immune to this ability for 24 hours. This is a language-dependent ability.

items.name: Barricade
items.description: You are adept at creating quick, temporary cover. As a move action, you can stack and reinforce objects that are too small or too fragile to provide cover into a single square of adjacent cover. The GM has discretion over whether enough such objects are nearby to allow you to use this ability, but most urban and wilderness settings not specifically described as empty or barren have enough such material to allow at least one such temporary barricade to be built. The barricade grants partial cover against attacks with line of effect that pass through it. If the barricade is in a square that already granted partial cover, it instead grants normal cover. For more information about cover, see page 253. The barricade is temporary and not particularly durable. When determining its hardness and Hit Points, treat it as a piece of equipment with an item level equal to half your total ranks in Engineering (minimum 1st level). Additionally, once it or a creature adjacent to it is hit by an attack, the barricade collapses at the beginning of your turn in 1d4 rounds (unless the barricade is destroyed completely by the attack). There isn’t normally enough material for you to build a second barricade in exactly the same space unless you are in a particularly crowded area (as determined by the GM).

items.name: Basic Melee Weapon Proficiency
items.shortDescription: No penalty to attacks with basic melee weapons
items.description: You gain proficiency in basic melee weapons (see Weapon Proficiency on page 243).

items.name: Blind-Fight
items.description: You are skilled at attacking opponents you can’t clearly see. In melee, every time you miss because of concealment (see page 253), you can reroll your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit (see page 243). You aren’t flat-footed against melee attacks from creatures you can’t see, and you can withdraw from creatures you can’t perceive. You don’t need to attempt Acrobatics checks to move at full speed while blinded.

items.name: Bodyguard
items.shortDescription: Add a +2 bonus to an adjacent ally’s AC as a reaction
items.description:
You can attempt to ward off attacks that target nearby allies.

Benefit: As a reaction when an adjacent ally is attacked, you can grant that ally a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against that attack. If you do so, you take a –2 penalty to your own Armor Class until the beginning of your next turn.

items.name: Cleave
items.shortDescription: Make an additional melee attack if the first one hits
items.description: :As a standard action, you can make a single melee attack against a foe within reach. If you hit, you deal damage normally and can make an additional melee attack (using your full base attack bonus) against a foe that is adjacent to the first and also within reach. You can make only one additional attack per round with this feat. When you use this feat, you take a –2 penalty to your Armor Class until your next turn.

items.name: Climbing Master
items.shortDescription: Gain a climb speed equal to your base speed
items.description: You can climb as well as a monkey or a spider. You gain a climb speed equal to your land speed.

items.name: Close Combat
items.shortDescription: +2 bonus to AC against attacks from far away after melee attack
items.description: When you are attacking a foe in melee, you know how to maneuver to make it more difficult for other foes to target you. When you hit an adjacent foe with a melee attack, as long as you are adjacent to that target, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC against attacks from other creatures that are not adjacent to you until the beginning of your next turn.

items.name: Combat Casting
items.shortDescription: +2 bonus to AC and saves against attacks of opportunity when casting spells
items.description: You leave fewer openings when casting a spell. You gain a +2 bonus to your Armor Class and saving throws against attacks of opportunity you provoked by casting a spell and against readied actions triggered by your spellcasting.

items.name: Connection Inkling

prerequisites.description: Wis 15, character level 5th, no levels in mystic.

items.description: Gain the ability to cast minor mystic spells

items.name: Coordinated Shot
items.description: Allies gain a +1 bonus to ranged attacks against foes you threaten

items.name: Corruption’s Gift
items.prerequisites: One or more corruption manifestations (see pages 40-45 of Starfinder Adventure Path #10: The Diaspora Strain)
items.description: Gain permanent manifestation gift

items.name: Craven Ploy
items.description: Willing ally takes -2 to AC to increase your AC by 2

items.name: Deadly Aim
items.shortDescription: Take a −2 penalty to weapon attacks to deal extra damage
items.description: Your can strike your enemies’ weak points and deal more damage. When you take the attack or full attack action with weapons (including a solarian’s solar manifestation, but not spells or other special abilities of any kind), you can take a –2 penalty to your attack rolls. If you do, those attacks deal additional damage equal to half your base attack bonus (minimum 1).

items.name: Deflect Projectiles
items.description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to attempt to avoid a ranged attack

items.name: Diehard
items.description: You can spend Resolve Points to stabilize and to stay in the fight in the same round

items.name: Dive for Cover
items.description: Fall prone in an adjacent square to roll a Reflex save twice

items.name: Diversion
items.description: Use Bluff to create a distraction so that your allies can hide

items.name: Divine Blessing
items.prerequisites: Worship a deity of an alignment within one step of your own alignment (Starfinder Core Rulebook 25).
items.description: Gain a deity unique power based on who you worship

items.name: Drag Down
items.description: When you are tripped, you can attempt to trip an adjacent foe

items.name: Enhanced Resistance
items.description: Gain damage reduction or energy resistance

items.name: Extended Telepathy
items.description: Increase range of limited telepathy

items.name: Extra Resolve
items.description: Gain 2 additional Resolve Points

items.name: Far Shot
items.description: Reduce penalty due to range increments

items.name: Fast Talk
items.description: Baffle a potential foe, causing it to be surprised when combat begins

items.name: Fleet
items.description: While you are wearing light or no armor, your land speed increases by 10 feet. When you are encumbered, your land speed instead increases by only 5 feet. When you are overburdened, your speed is reduced to 10 feet.

items.name: Focused Spellcaster

prerequisites.description: Combat Casting, ability to cast 4th-level spells

items.description: Spend a resolve point to stop a spell from failing from taking damage

items.name: Fusillade

prerequisites.description: Base attack bonus +1, four or more arms

items.description: Make an automatic-mode attack with multiple small arms

items.name: Great Cleave
items.description: Make an additional melee attack after each melee attack that hits

items.name: Great Fortitude
items.description: +2 bonus to Fortitude saves

items.name: Greater Feint
items.description: Foes you feint against are flat-footed for 1 round

items.name: Greater Shadow Infusion

prerequisites.description: Improved Shadow Infusion, Shadow Infusion, character level 13th

items.description: Become incorporeal and reduce physical and nonphysical damage

items.name: Greater Spell Penetration
items.description: Additional +2 bonus to caster level checks to overcome SR

items.name: Grenade Proficiency
items.description: No penalty to attacks made with grenades

items.name: Harm Undead
items.prerequisites: Healing channel connection power, mystic level 1st
items.description: Expend a spell slot for healing channel to also damage undead

items.name: Heavy Armor Proficiency
items.shortDescription: No penalty to attack rolls while wearing heavy armor
items.description: You gain proficiency in heavy armor (see page 242).

items.name: Heavy Weapon Proficiency

prerequisites.description: Str 13, proficiency in small arms and longarms

items.shortDescription: No penalty to attacks with heavy weapons
items.description: You gain proficiency in heavy weapons (see page 243).

items.name: Improved Combat Maneuver
items.description: +4 bonus to perform one combat maneuver

items.name: Improved Critical
items.description: The DC to resist the critical effects of your critical hits increases by 2

items.name: Improved Demoralize
items.description: You can use the Intimidate skill to demoralize as a move action.

items.name: Improved Feint
items.description: Use Bluff to feint as a move action

items.name: Improved Great Fortitude
items.description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to reroll a Fortitude save

items.name: Improved Initiative
items.description: +4 bonus to initiative checks

items.name: Improved Iron Will
items.description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to reroll a Will save

items.name: Improved Lightning Reflexes
items.description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to reroll a Reflex save

items.name: Improved Shadow Infusion
items.description: Become shrouded in shadow to gain concealment

items.name: Improved Sidestep

prerequisites.description: Dex 17, Mobility or trick attack class feature, Sidestep

items.description: Reduce penalties from Sidestep

items.name: Improved Stand Still
items.description: +4 bonus to melee attacks with Stand Still

items.name: Improved Unarmed Strike
items.shortDescription: Deal more damage and threaten squares with unarmed strikes
items.description: Your unarmed attack damage increases to 1d6 at 4th level, 2d6 at 8th level, 3d6 at 12th level, 5d6 at 15th level, and 7d6 at 20th level. You threaten squares within your natural reach with your unarmed strikes even when you do not have a hand free for an unarmed strike. If you are immobilized, entangled, or unable to use both legs (or whatever appendages you have in place of legs, where appropriate), you lose the ability to make unarmed strikes without your hands. When making an unarmed strike without your hands, you can’t use such attacks for combat maneuvers or similar abilities—only to deal damage.

items.name: In Harm’s Way
items.description: Take the damage of a successful attack against an adjacent ally

items.name: Indirect Retreat
items.description: Allows you to turn during full action run

items.name: Iron Will
items.description: +2 bonus to Will saves

items.name: Jet Dash
items.shortDescription: Move faster when running, double height and distance when jumping
items.description: When running, you move six times your land speed. Whenever you jump, double the height and distance you can jump. While running, you don’t gain the flat-footed condition.

items.name: Kasathan Battle Dance
items.description: Withdrawing with two hands free does not provoke attacks of opportunity

items.name: Kip Up
items.description: Stand from prone as a swift action

items.name: Light Armor Proficiency
items.description: No penalty to attack rolls while wearing light armor

items.name: Lightning Reflexes
items.description: +2 bonus to Reflex saves

items.name: Longarm Proficiency
items.description: No penalty to attacks with longarms

items.name: Lunge
items.description: Increase reach of melee attacks by 5 feet until the end of your turn

items.name: Major Psychic Power

prerequisites.description: Cha 15, Minor Psychic Power, Psychic Power, character level 7th

items.description: Cast a 2nd-level spell as a spell-like ability 1/day

items.name: Major Stage Magic

prerequisites.description: Cha 15, Minor Stage Magic, Stage Magic, character level 7th

items.description: Gain a 2nd level spell to help distract foes or entertain crowds

items.name: Master Crafter
items.prerequisites: Computers, Engineering, Life Science, Mysticism, Physical Science, or appropriate Profession 5 ranks
items.description: Craft items in half the normal time

items.name: Medical Expert

prerequisites.description: Life Science 1 rank, Medicine 1 rank, Physical Science 1 rank

items.description: Treat deadly wounds more quickly, and provide long-term care without a medical lab

items.name: Minor Psychic Power
items.description: Cast a 0-level spell as a spell-like ability 3/day

items.name: Minor Stage Magic
items.description: Gain a 0-level spell to help distract foes or entertain crowds

items.name: Mobility
items.description: +4 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity from movement

items.name: Multi-Weapon Fighting
items.description: Reduce the penalty for full attacks when using multiple small arms or operative melee weapons

items.name: Mystic Strike
items.description: Melee and ranged attacks count as magic

items.name: Nimble Moves
items.description: Ignore 20 feet of difficult terrain when you move

items.name: Opening Volley
items.description: +2 bonus to a melee attack against a target you damaged with a ranged attack

items.name: Parting Shot

prerequisites.description: Dex 15, Mobility, Shot on the Run, base attack bonus +6

items.description: Make a single ranged attack when withdrawing

items.name: Penetrating Attack
items.description: Reduce enemy's DR and energy resistance against your weapons by 5

items.name: Penetrating Spell
items.description: Reduce enemy's DR and energy resistance against your spells by 5

items.name: Polymorph Adept
items.prerequisites: You know the polymorph spell as a 3rd-level spell or higher.
items.description: Allows you to change polymorph form as standard action without penalty

items.name: Powered Armored Proficiency

prerequisites.description: Str 13, base attack bonus +5, proficiency in light and heavy armor

items.description: No penalty to attack rolls while wearing powered armor

items.name: Protector of Kahlannal
items.prerequisites: Anassanoi, any non-chaotic and non-evil alignment
items.description: You are one of the eight ordained Protectors of the anassanoi people of Kahlannal.

items.name: Psychic Insight
items.description: Gain bonuses against creatures you communicate with telepathically

items.name: Psychic Power

prerequisites.description: Cha 13, Minor Psychic Power, character level 4th

items.description: Cast a 1st-level spell as a spell-like ability 1/day

items.name: Psychic Sense
items.description: Gain blinsense using telepathy

items.name: Pull the Pin
items.description: Perform a disarm to activate a foe’s grenade

items.name: Quick Draw
items.description: Draw a weapon as a swift action

items.name: Reflect Projectiles
items.description: Spend 1 Resolve Point to attempt to redirect a ranged attack

items.name: Shadow Infusion
items.prerequisites: You must spend a significant time on the Shadow Plane or otherwise become infused with its energies, such as by dying there or gaining shadow corruption. The GM determines whether you qualify for this feat
items.description: Gain low-light vision and darkvision, or see in darkness

items.name: Shot on the Run
items.description: Make a ranged attack at any point during movement

items.name: Sidestep

prerequisites.description: Dex 15, Mobility or trick attack class feature

items.description: Take guarded step as a reaction when a foe misses you with melee attack

items.name: Skill Focus
items.description: +3 insight bonus to one skill

items.name: Skill Synergy
items.description: Gain two new class skills or a +2 insight bonus to those skills

items.name: Sky Jockey
items.description: Make jetpacks, vehicles, and starships go faster

items.name: Slippery Shooter
items.description: +3 bonus to AC against attacks of opportunity when making ranged attacks

items.name: Small Arm Proficiency
items.description: No penalty to attacks with small arms

items.name: Sniper Weapon Proficiency
items.description: No penalty to attacks with sniper weapons

items.name: Special Weapon Proficiency

prerequisites.description: Proficiency in basic melee weapons or small arms

items.description: No penalty to attacks with one special weapon

items.name: Spell Focus

prerequisites.description: Ability to cast spells, character level 3rd

items.description: DCs of spells you cast increase

items.name: Spell Penetration
items.description: +2 bonus to caster level checks to overcome SR

items.name: Spellbane
items.prerequisites: Unable to cast spells or use spell-like abilities
items.description: +2 insight bonus to saving throws against spells and spell-like abilities

items.name: Spring Attack
items.description: Move before and after a melee attack

items.name: Spry Cover
items.description: Covering fire grants a +4 bonus to an ally’s Acrobatics check to tumble

items.name: Squox Companion
items.prerequisites: You own a trained squox that has an attitude of friendly or helpful toward you.
items.description: Gain bonuses for having a pet sqoux

items.name: Stage Magic

prerequisites.description: Cha 13, Minor Stage Magic, character level 4th

items.description: Gain a 1st level spell to help distract foes or entertain crowds

items.name: Stand Still
items.description: Make an attack of opportunity to stop a foe’s movement

items.name: Startled Scream
items.description: Stops surprised allies from being flatfooted in surprise round

items.name: Steel Nerves
items.description: +2 bonus against fear and other bonuses against fear effects

items.name: Step Up
items.description: Take a guarded step as a reaction to an adjacent foe moving

items.name: Step Up and Strike

prerequisites.description: Dex 13, Step Up, base attack bonus +6

items.description: Make an attack of opportunity as part of Step Up

items.name: Strike Back
items.description: Ready an action to make a melee attack against a foe with reach

items.name: Suppressive Fire

prerequisites.description: Base attack bonus +1, proficiency with heavy weapons

items.description: Provide covering fire or harrying fire in an area

items.name: Swimming Master
items.description: Gain a swim speed equal to your base speed

items.name: Technomantic Dabbler

prerequisites.description: Intelligence 15, character level 5th, no levels in technomancer

items.description: Gain the ability to cast minor technomancer spells

items.name: Telepathic Spy
items.description: Intercept psychic communications with a sense motive check

items.name: Toughness
items.description: +1 Stamina Point per character level and other bonuses

items.name: Unfriendly Fire
items.description: Trick an attacker into shooting at another enemy adjacent to you

items.name: Veiled Threat
items.description: Intimidated foe doesn’t become hostile

items.name: Versatile Focus
items.description: +1 bonus to attack rolls with all weapon types you are proficient with

items.name: Versatile Specialization
items.description: Deal extra damage with all weapon types you are proficient with

items.name: Wary Withdrawal
items.description: Allows withdraw during total defense action

items.name: Weapon Focus
items.description: +1 bonus to attack rolls with selected weapon type

items.name: Weapon Specialization

prerequisites.description: Character level 3rd, proficiency with selected weapon type

items.description: Deal extra damage with selected weapon type
